|brand = DeWalt |model = DCT100 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = industrial access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = YJ7DCT100, TK4WLE200N2-23, XQ8WLE200N5-23ESD |icid = 9082A-DCT100 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);i.MX6DL;MCIMX6U, 7CVM08AC; <!-- [http://www.ameya360.com/search/MCIMX6U/1 MCIMX6U] - i.MX6DL DualLite (ARM Cortex-A9) --> |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 GHz undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F2G08ABAEAH4-IT:E; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K128M16JT-125 IT:K; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 04:F0:21 |oui = 04:F0:21
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 120 |pwr_ac_hz = 60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.6 |pwr_poe_type = ns |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = yes,, 10-pin header
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = IP67 |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microchip;SST12LP15A;;2; ,,, SPDT Switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85601;SKY, 85601, 629MM;2;;16-pin QFN;2.5 mm x 2.5mm; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microchip;SST11LP12;SST, 11LP12, 6270SR;2; ,,, 6-lane, 6-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8606;PLX, Technology (R), PEX8606-BA50BI G, 1539, 3BJLF3 TAIWAN;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Gateworks |manuf_model = Ventana GW5520 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/27/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = United States
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Compex WLE200N2-23 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9283;AR9283-AL1A, FK702YXJ, 1702, TAIWAN; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Compex WLE200N5-23-ESD |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9280; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "VENTANA NETWORK PROCESSOR", "GATEWORKS CORPORATION", "PCB 02210147-03", and "COPYRIGHT 2017" are silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos.
According to the Gateworks [http://trac.gateworks.com/wiki/ventana/errata Ventana Errata] page, the 02210147-03 PCB code corresponds to the [[Gateworks Ventana GW5520]]-D.
The board has been customized including removal of the HDMI, USB, and barrel power plugs.
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.gateworks.com/imx6-single-board-computers-gateworks-ventana-family/item/ventana-gw5520-single-board-computer GW5520 Product Page] *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/gateworks/gateworks_ventanagw5520 ''Gateworks Ventana GW5520'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([http://trac.gateworks.com/wiki/ventana/withoutpcieswitch ''GateWorks'' wiki]) *[http://linuxgizmos.com/linux-friendly-i-mx6-sbc-offers-dual-gbe-poe-hdmi/ ''Linux-friendly i.MX6 SBC offers dual-GbE, PoE, HDMI'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==See also== *[[Gateworks Ventana GW5200]] *[[Gateworks Ventana GW5300]] *[[Gateworks Ventana GW5400]]
